task.title: Adding project participants
task.shortdesc: Document owners assign reviewers , co-authors and co-owners to a project.

ul.li: If you have not yet added a new document to , do so now.
Ensure that each person who needs to review the document has a user account.

taskbody.context: To assign participants to a review project:

step.cmd:
In the Add Review Project
dialog, click Select Authors.
Add authors and/or document owners to the project as follows:

substep.cmd: Click the user name in the pane on the left (under the Available Users heading).
Click the >> button under the appropriate heading.

step.stepresult: The highlighted user is added to the list of authors or document owners.

image.alt: General and Reviewers tabs of the Add Review Project dialog

step.cmd: Click the user name in the pane on the left (under the Available Users heading), then click the >> button to add the highlighted user to the list of Reviewers.
step.stepresult: The user is added to the project as a Reviewer. The default Reviewer role is Required.
